jx.jx_cn_mean: 无论如何：无论任何困难情况

lj.lj_ly: Be there on time or else!
lj.lj_ls: 无论如何一定要按时到

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English elles, of Germanic origin; related to Middle Dutch els and Swedish eljest

entry.def: You use else after words such as 'anywhere', 'someone', and 'what', to refer in a vague way to another person, place, or thing.

example.ex: If I can't make a living at painting, at least I can teach someone else to paint...
example.tran: 如果我不能靠画画谋生，至少我可以教别人画画。

example.ex: We had nothing else to do on those long trips...
example.tran: 在那些漫长的旅程中我们没有别的事情可做。

entry.def: You use else after words such as 'everyone', 'everything', and 'everywhere' to refer in a vague way to all the other people, things, or places except the one you are talking about.

example.ex: As I try to be truthful, I expect everyone else to be truthful...
example.tran: 既然我努力做到诚实，我希望其他所有人也能诚实。

example.ex: Cigarettes are in short supply, like everything else here.
example.tran: 和其他所有东西一样，这里的香烟也供应不足。

entry.def: You use or else after stating a logical conclusion, to indicate that what you are about to say is evidence for that conclusion.

example.ex: He must be a good plumber, or else he wouldn't be so busy...
example.tran: 他肯定是个不错的管子工，要不然他不会那么忙。

example.ex: Evidently no lessons have been learnt or else the government would not have handled the problem so sloppily.
example.tran: 政府显然没有吸取教训，不然不会把问题处理得那么草率。

entry.tran: （引出不好的结果）否则，要不然
entry.def: You use or else to introduce a statement that indicates the unpleasant results that will occur if someone does or does not do something.

example.ex: This time we really need to succeed or else people will start giving us funny looks...
example.tran: 这次我们真的需要成功，否则人们会开始用异样的眼光看我们。

example.ex: Make sure you are strapped in very well, or else you will fall out.
example.tran: 一定要系好安全带，否则会摔出去。

entry.tran: （表示另外一种可能性）或者，还是，要不
entry.def: You use or else to introduce the second of two possibilities when you do not know which one is true.

example.ex: You are either a total genius or else you must be absolutely raving mad...
example.tran: 你要么是个不折不扣的天才，要么就是完全疯了。

example.ex: It's likely someone gave her a lift, or else that she took a taxi.
example.tran: 可能有人开车捎了她一程，要不就是她打了辆出租车。

entry.def: Above all else is used to emphasize that a particular thing is more important than other things.

example.ex: Above all else I hate the cold.
You can say 'if nothing else' to indicate that what you are mentioning is, in your opinion, the only good thing in a particular situation.
example.tran: (表示唯一的好情况)起码，至少

example.ex: If nothing else, you'll really enjoy meeting them.
example.tran: 至少你一定会很高兴见到他们。

entry.tran: (表示威胁)否则的话，要不然的话
entry.def: You say 'or else' after a command to warn someone that if they do not obey, you will be angry and may harm or punish them.

example.ex: He told us to put it right, or else.
example.tran: 他让我们纠正错误，否则后果自负。

means.word_mean: 1. other than what is under consideration or implied;

sentences.sentence: "I don't know what else to do"

means.word_mean: 1. additional to or different from this one or place or time or manner;

Sentence.sentence: Before the internet, renting a surfboard, a power tool or a parking space from someone else was feasible, but was usually more trouble than it was worth

The Magician   The revolution that Steve Jobs led is only just beginning When it came to putting on a show, nobody else in the computer industry, or any other industry for that matter, could match Steve Jobs
But Everybody Does It" Most people who get in trouble do know the rules and facts but manage to fool themselves about the risks they're taking by using excuses: "Everyone else does it
They came up with 10 or 15 names, and that group of stars was compared with everyone else.

When these people ran up against a technical problem, to which they'd have to turn to someone else for an answer, they'd e-mail and get an answer right away, because they built up a network of people before they needed them
What about dropping you at the south gate and I'll find parking somewhere else.

sentences.en: When else shall we meet again, if Sunday is not convenient for you?
sentences.cn: 要是星期日对你不方便, 那么我们另外什么时候再碰头呢?

sentences.en: Tom is taller than everyone else in his class.
sentences.cn: 汤姆比班上其他的人都高。

jushi.english: All else but me did well in the examination.
jushi.chinese: 除了我以外,所有的人都考得好。

jushi.english: Anything else can I do for you?
jushi.chinese: 我还能为你做些什么呢?
